item.description:
Update

Sorry for the late update on the exact showtime, which is 7:00. I will be at the theater at 6:15. We'll head into the theater to get seats at 6:40.

Details

In general, since we see movies opening weekend, it is a very good idea to buy tickets ahead of time on fandango.com...especially if it is a big name movie.

I will be wearing my red hat with the meetup logo. Check out my picture on the meetup site, so you will recognize me. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will snag a table by the windows at the top of the escalator and if it is downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.

If you miss the group before the movie, we gather after the movie just outside the room where it was shown to talk about the movie a bit and get a head count of those who would like to come out for drinks, munchies and lively conversation.

Movie Details:

Release Date: October 15, 2010
Studio: Summit Entertainment
Director: Robert Schwentke
Screenwriter: Erich Hoeber, Jon Hoeber
Starring: Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich, Helen Mirren, Karl Urban, Mary-Louise Parker, Brian Cox, Julian McMahon, Richard Dreyfuss
Genre: Action, Comedy
MPAA Rating: PG-13 (for intense sequences of action violence and brief strong language)
Official Website:
http://www.red-themov...

Plot Summary: Based on the cult D.C. Comics graphic novel by Warren Ellis and Cully Hamner, "Red" is an explosive action-comedy starring Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich and Helen Mirren.

Frank (Bruce Willis), Joe (Morgan Freeman), Marvin (John Malkovich) and Victoria (Helen Mirren) used to be the CIA's top agents â€“ but the secrets they know just made them the Agency's top targets. Now framed for assassination, they must use all of their collective cunning, experience and teamwork to stay one step ahead of their deadly pursuers and stay alive. To stop the operation, the team embarks on an impossible, cross-country mission to break into the top-secret CIA headquarters, where they will uncover one of the biggest conspiracies and cover-ups in government history.
